{"id":831658534,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"1 month, 3 weeks","timestamp":1666904840,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"33 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/831658534/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Zigzag Conversion","memory":"10.3 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    string convert(string s, int numRows) {\n        int n = s.size();\n        vector<string>ret(numRows, \"\");\n\n        int rowCount = 0;\n        for(int i=0; i<n; ){\n            while(i<n && rowCount < numRows){\n                ret[rowCount].push_back(s[i++]);\n                rowCount++;\n            }\n\n            rowCount --;\n            while(i<n && rowCount){\n                rowCount--;\n                if(rowCount > 0) ret[rowCount].push_back(s[i++]);\n            }\n        }\n\n        int index = 0;\n        for(int i=0; i<numRows; i++){\n            for(int j=0; j<ret[i].size(); j++){\n                s[index++] = ret[i][j];\n            }\n        }\n        return s;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"zigzag-conversion","has_notes":false,"notes":"","topic_tags":[]}
